name: Ahaanconsulting
description: Ahaan, Sanskrit for ‘sun rise’, is focused on creating a positive change in your workforce so that they can bring the best of their potential… their ‘true’ potential, to work every day. Ahaan Consulting helps organization unlock its Human Potential by making employees aware of their strengths and facilitating their environment to provide them with the right systems and resources to achieve what’s possible. We do this in one of the 2 ways. One way is to create highly interactive learning modules which are customized to the Learner and focus on Implementation rather than concepts. Another way is to become your HR Strategy Partners by helping you build people processes which enable employees to perform at their highest potential. We also specialize in becoming your outsourced training partner.

ShortDescription: Ahaan consulting become true strategic partner for Organisation’s development and training needs. We develop unique methodology that combines Psychology, Behavioural studies and Effective Coaching theories that enables to convert Learning into Behaviour.
enhanced_description: Ahaanconsulting, deriving its name from the Sanskrit word for 'sun rise', is an HR consulting firm focused on creating positive change and unlocking the full human potential within organizations. They achieve this by making employees aware of their strengths and optimizing their environment with appropriate systems and resources. Their methodology includes developing highly interactive, customized learning modules that prioritize implementation over theoretical concepts. Additionally, Ahaanconsulting partners with organizations as HR Strategy Partners, helping them build robust people processes that enable employees to perform at their highest potential. They also specialize as an outsourced training partner, offering corporate training, coaching, HR consulting, and people development. Their unique approach integrates Psychology, Behavioural studies, and Effective Coaching theories to ensure that learning translates directly into tangible behavioral change.
